title: Kirby Model 2C Owners Manual from 1937-1939
content:
1. Information such as the country: USA  
2. Age of the sample 1937-1939  
3. A pdf scan of the user manual can be found at [http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190447/http:/www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/ "http://www.kirby.com/consumer-relations/product-manuals/") and look for model 2C at the bottom of the page.  
4. I am trying to reproduce the old manual and would like to know the fonts used so I can re-create the manual to be as close to the original one as possible.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190447im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2C_Font_Test_5554.jpg)

Font: 

 Kabel Heavy & Bodoni 

Solved By: 

 [kthomps5](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190447/http:/typophile.com/user/175823 "View user profile.")
author: mbpb45

comments.content:
The sans serif headline at the top is Kabel Heavy:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190447/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/kabel/")

The serif text is and subheads are Bodoni:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317190447/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/bodoni/")
This is perfect kthomps5! Thank you so much for all of your help!
Now if my grammar would only improve...yikes, I have to stop typing after midnight.
